reviewText: It took me a long time to get around to watching this. It doesn't play on United States equipment. Because of the delay, it's past the return period.
Would be great if they posted it was a version 2 DVD only playable on certain DVD players. Burned again!
Great movie soundtrack. Excellent story for something "true". Works best on a PC.

Great little movie about the rise of Rock in the UK and rock radio stations. Not deep but fun. I like the US cut & soundtrack better, but ths has some scenes not seen in the US version (which goes by the title "Pirate Radio")
